title: "Singapore clinches 6.4% of Q2 fintech deal value despite funding winter: KPMG"
excerpt: "SINGAPORE has clinched a bigger slice of global investments into fintech. The city-state grew its market share by deal value to 6.4 per cent in Q2 2022, up from 3.1 per cent in 2021, an analysis by KPMG found."
